sn22.151:1.2: “Kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṁ upādāya, kiṁ abhinivissa:
sn22.151:1.3: ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassatī”ti?
sn22.151:1.5: “rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṁ upādāya, rūpaṁ abhinivissa …pe…
sn22.151:1.6: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṁ upādāya, viññāṇaṁ abhinivissa:
sn22.151:1.7: ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati.
sn22.151:1.11: vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, api nu taṁ anupādāya etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti samanupasseyyāti?
sn22.151:1.18: vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, api nu taṁ anupādāya etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti samanupasseyyāti?
